**TODAY'S HIGH-VALUE ACTION:**
Refinance mortgage to lower interest rate and reduce monthly payments.

**WHY THIS MATTERS:**
By refinancing his mortgage, Matthew can save ~$150/month (total potential savings over 2 years: $36,000) and pay off the loan 10 months earlier. This aligns with his goals of financial optimization and will make progress towards his long-term objectives.

**EXECUTION STEPS:**

1. **Research Local Refinancing Options**: Visit [www.ky.gov/poverty/financial-education/mortgage-refinance](http://www.ky.gov/poverty/financial-education/mortgage-refinance) (Kentucky Government Website for Mortgage Refinance Information) and explore refinancing options with local banks or credit unions that offer competitive rates.
2. **Verify Current Interest Rate**: Contact [Louisville Federal Credit Union](https://louisvillefcu.com/) at 502-583-4444 to confirm the current interest rate on Matthew's mortgage and determine if they can provide a better rate through refinancing.
3. **Gather Required Documents**: Collect identification documents (driver's license, passport) and credit report from [Experian](https://www.experian.com/) or [Equifax](https://www.equifax.com/).
4. **Complete Online Mortgage Application**: Visit [LendingTree](https://www.lendingtree.com/mortgage/refinance/) to complete an online mortgage application with a participating lender.
5. **Submit Refinancing Application**: Submit the refinancing application and supporting documents (identification, credit report) within 24 hours of completing step 4.

**RESOURCES REQUIRED:**

- Time: 2-3 hours to research, verify interest rate, gather documents, and complete online mortgage application
- Money: None (no upfront costs required)
- Tools:
	+ Online mortgage calculator (e.g., [NerdWallet Mortgage Calculator](https://www.nerdwallet.com/mortgage-calculator/))
	+ Identification documents (driver's license, passport) from Experian or Equifax
	+ Credit report from Experian or Equifax

**SUCCESS CRITERIA:**
Matthew will have successfully refinanced his mortgage and reduced his monthly payments by at least $150/month.

**VERIFICATION CHECKPOINTS:**

1. Verify the current interest rate with Louisvile Federal Credit Union.
2. Confirm that the online mortgage application was submitted correctly and received confirmation from the lender.
3. Review Matthew's credit report to ensure it is accurate and up-to-date.

By following these steps, Matthew can take advantage of current interest rates and refinance his mortgage to lower his monthly payments, saving money over time and making progress towards his long-term financial objectives.
